comments.body: Not sure why these don't fail the style checker, but, space after cats, i++ instead of i ++, and 1.0e-8 for clarity
This needs a rebase and you might run dev/lint-java manually; I think this cast will still fail the style checker?

Fixed the cast style issue, although the Jenkins style checker does not complain anything. I run `dev/lint-java` locally and it complains lots of issues irrelevant with this PR, so may be the Java style checker was disabled by Jenkins. I think we can track the style checker issue in a separate JIRA.
